title: Summer chicken pasta salad
ingredients: ['6 eggs', '450g pasta', '6 mini chicken fillets', '1 cucumber, sliced', '1 bunch radishes, trimmed and sliced', '2 carrots, peeled and sliced', '3 spring onions, thinly sliced', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '1 bottle Italian or balsamic salad dressing', '4 romaine lettuce, thinly sliced']
